item.title: Report E-2025040637
item.description:
Report E-2025040637

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-28T03:42:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-31
  • City: ROCKFORD
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from two (2) 1-gallon metal pails in a paper box due to improperly loaded freight that resulted in the pails leaking. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel gathered the pails and containerized it into one (1) 5-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING CORROSIVE AT BAY 12. USING DECISION TREE RESPONSE SHEETS THE LEAK WAS CONTAINED AND PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP. ONE OF 4 PLASTIC CONTAINERS HAD A LOOSE CAP AND LEAKED. ALL CONTENTS ARE PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.
